data.title: Ubbi Dubbi (simplified)!
data.statement:
Translate the text to the simplified Ubbi Dubbi language.

<<Rules:>>
In this <<simplified>> version, Ubbi Dubbi works by adding {{ub}} before each vowel letter ({{a}}, {{e}}, {{i}}, {{o}}, {{u}}).
But, if there are two (or more) consecutive vowels, {{ub}} comes only before the first vowel.

testCases.title: Test 2
testCases.testIn: we wish you a marry christmas and a happy new year
testCases.testOut: wube wubish yubou uba mubarry chrubistmubas uband uba hubappy nubew yubear

testCases.title: Validator 2
testCases.testIn: may the force be with you
testCases.testOut: mubay thube fuborcube bube wubith yubou

testCases.title: Test 3
testCases.testIn: harry potter and the prisoner of azkaban
testCases.testOut: hubarry pubottuber uband thube prubisubonuber ubof ubazkubabuban

testCases.title: Validator 3
testCases.testIn: hello. my name is inigo montoya. you killed my father. prepare to die.
testCases.testOut: hubellubo. my nubamube ubis ubinubigubo mubontuboyuba. yubou kubillubed my fubathuber. prubepubarube tubo dubie.

testCases.title: Test 4
testCases.testIn: lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consectetur adipisicing elit, sed do eiusmod tempor incididunt ut labore et dolore magna aliqua.
testCases.testOut: luborubem ubipsubum dubolubor subit ubamubet, cubonsubectubetubur ubadubipubisubicubing ubelubit, subed dubo ubeiusmubod tubempubor ubincubidubidubunt ubut lubabuborube ubet duboluborube mubagnuba ubalubiqubua.

data.outputDescription: <<Line 1:>> [[input]] translated to the simplified Ubbi Dubbi language.

lastVersion.statementHTML:
Goal

Translate the text to the simplified Ubbi Dubbi language.

Rules:
In this simplified version, Ubbi Dubbi works by adding ub before each vowel letter (a, e, i, o, u).
But, if there are two (or more) consecutive vowels, ub comes only before the first vowel.
Input
Line 1: A string input.
Output
Line 1: input translated to the simplified Ubbi Dubbi language.
Constraints
1 ≤ length of input ≤ 1024
input is in lowercase.
Example
Input
hello world
Output
hubellubo wuborld
